text: Kozhino () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 2 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located on the Lyp River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Kozhino, Perm Krai
